timeline.message: bp: Add ClusterBlockTests back to es test suite

timeline.bodyText: is it needed? testCompile extends compile, and there is already compile project(':libs:shared')
timeline.author: kovrus
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -61,6 +61,7 @@ dependencies {
     compile "javax.xml.bind:jaxb-api:${versions.jaxb_api}"
 
     testCompile project(path: ':libs:dex', configuration: 'testOutput')
+    testCompile project(':libs:shared')

replies.bodyText: You are right, this was a local setup problem. Thanks!

timeline.message:
bp: Add ReadOnlyEngineTests back to es test suite

This adds the previously removed ReadOnlyEngineTests back to the
es test suite. The test is adapted to our current state of the
code base because it diverged.
